snippet.title: EscapeVR: The Basement - VR Escape Room (Vive & Rift)
snippet.description:
EscapeVR: The Basement is a VR escape room game for the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift+Touch. ▼ More information below ▼

You are locked in a basement. Will you manage to escape?

—
EscapeVR: The Basement is inspired by real-life escape games, makes full use of the room-scale virtual reality of the Vive and Oculus+Touch, and offers challenging puzzles you have to solve to escape the room. 

Can you escape? 

Find out more on the EscapeVR website: https://www.escapevr.net/

► Get it here:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/552060/EscapeVR_The_Basement/
Oculus Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1245663708851446/
Viveport: https://www.viveport.com/apps/64a05227-df61-46bc-b2e8-a44216c8d9a9

Thanks and have fun!


EscapeVR: The Basement is developed by Sourcenity: http://www.sourcenity.com/
